Player History
Drafted in 10th round, 148th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Freddy Rodriguez (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/1/2016 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 7/9/2016 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 7/24/2016 with a Bruised Heel, out for 5 days...
10/20/2016: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $650,000 per year, for 2 years.
